result.purpose: Responsible for the configuration, initialization, and dependency injection of the CMS application.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, utilizing dependency injection for better separation of concerns and easier testing.

cmd/cms/config.go.purpose: Defines the configuration structure for the CMS application.

cmd/cms/main.go.purpose: Initializes and starts the reward distributor application.

cmd/cms/wire.go.purpose: This file sets up dependency injection for the CMS application using Google Wire.

cmd/cms/wire_gen.go.purpose: Generates dependency injection code for the CMS application using Wire.
